activities: Visitors to our website may voluntarily ask a question or request information and may provide personal information in doing so. There is a "contact us" section of the website that enables them to do this. Also, customers or consumers may file claims for issues arising in the use of our food products. During the claim process, personal information may be provided as needed for the investigation and evaluation of claims.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer, consumer and supplier data may be handled.
recoursemech: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA) or Switzerland and have any concerns or complaints, please first address these issues to the Privacy Officer. If the Privacy Officer does not satisfactorily address a complaint within thirty days, any dispute, controversy or claim shall be settled by an arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association.
